TopicTitle: KSP 2 gave me a BSOD for Clock Watchdog Timeout

Articles.Content:
Specs: 16gb ram  12th Gen Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-1260P, 2100 Mhz, 12 Core(s), 16 Logical Processor(s), I have Iris Xe integrated graphics. I know these are below the system requirements, but i have booted up ksp 2 before without getting a BSOD, albiet with bad preformance.

Severity: High. This not only crashed my game, but also crashed windows 11

Frequency: IDK because I don't want to get a BSOD multiple times

Description: I was going into ksp 2 with one edge tab open and steam open, and after creating a new campaign, my computer crashed and bluescreened.
